data.message: Can we have a straight parade?

replies.message: Yeah. When straight people are oppressed, kill themselves, are judged & bullied for being themselves. Until then, lol nope sorry.
Yeah, go ahead. No one is stopping you.

I mean....straight people are oppressed, do kill themselves, and are judged and bullied for being themselves thousands more times a year then gays...just not for being straight. so....urm....I see where you are going but you need to toss out some different examples there tomlin.
Yeah, why don't we get Straight Parades?   Why don't we have a Straight Pride Flag or a Straight Pride Day??
Thomas, that's not for being straight... the example is the correct one, no one gets in those situations for being straight... so...
if gays weren't so morally torn there would be no need for them to kil themselves..

Danny that's a horrible thing to say. Do you know why they're so morally torn? It's because they were taught to hate themselves early on. They were taught that there's no love for them in this world and they're better off dead. Please think before you say something as hateful as that.
Straight kids get bullied daily you idiots, stop acting like they don't. They get bullied just as much if not more.
There are straight people who are in minority groups, who kill themselves, are judged & bullied, depressed, etc.  Gays don't have a corner on that part of life.  Sorry.
No, we can't.  There would be riots and protests
@ZachOlson Straight kids do get bullied... but they don't get bullied for being straight... Where as gay kids get bullied because they are gay... know the difference!

There will be a straight parade the moment straight people:

- Get bullied because they are straight
- Get fired from their jobs JUST because they are straight (look it up... it is legal in some states in the US to fire someone for being gay.)
- Do not get the rights get married with the one you love and getting the legal benefits of being married
